headline: Arch Capital Group (ACGL) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Why Arch Capital Group (ACGL) Is On Investors’ Radar Arch Capital Group (ACGL) has drawn fresh attention after recent trading left the stock at $98.38, with returns over the past month, past 3 months, and year all in positive territory. See our latest analysis for Arch Capital Group. Recent trading has been a mixed bag, with a 1 day share price decline of 1.47% following a 30 day share price return of 8.53%.
